description: User interface widgets for dashboard functionality including customer contact dialogs and dashboard-specific components

components.ContactCustomerDialog: Customer contact dialog displaying appointment details with confirmation status and customer information.

rules: Modal dialog design with 400px fixed width for consistent customer contact information display.
Customer information display with name, phone, email, and fallback handling for missing contact details.
Appointment details section showing formatted time, date, confirmation status, and service information.
Time formatting utility converting 24-hour time strings to 12-hour AM/PM format with error handling.
Status-based visual indicators: green check for confirmed appointments, orange warning for unconfirmed.
Service listing displaying service names, prices, and duration for comprehensive appointment overview.
Service ID fallback handling showing service IDs when full service objects are not available.
Confirmation status logic determining whether to show confirmation action button based on appointment status.
Professional container styling with borders, background colors, and rounded corners for information sections.
Action button integration with confirmation workflow (currently placeholder with TODO implementation).
Icon integration providing visual context for contact information, time, date, and status elements.
Responsive layout with proper spacing and alignment for clean information presentation.
Theme integration using AppColors and AppTextStyles for consistent brand styling throughout dialog.
Close dialog functionality with both close button in header and close text button in footer.
Professional header with contact phone icon, dialog title, and positioned close button for user clarity.
